Name: Selobus Fantasy
About the game: All characters in this game are 18 or older. ♦Overview♦ One day, an letter arrives to a novice adventurer named 'Yunivers'. The letter said that it was searching for an adventurer to explore the ruins at a remote island named 'Cruijff Island'. Yuni got on board right away, and meets 'Neige', an adventurer just like herself. The adventure of Yunivers and Neige is now starting. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ♦Combat♦ Ordinary turn-based combat. Utilize uniques skills of your ally to undergo fierce battles. 　 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ♦System♦ ♢Overview Function You will be granted with an item that shows the next destination of the main story and a brief overview from the beginning. ♢Hide Windows Right click your mouse to disable message windows. ♢Text Speed Acceleration Hold the enter key to accelerate text speed.
